Text: Everyone should know that the author committed suicide in 2004. I assume researching this book had at the least contributed to her death if not caused it. She left behind her family.  http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iris_Chang
I read this book when it came out years ago. Just reading it is enough to make you want to commit suicide. A very sad, tough to get through kind of book.

not only japan had not paid paid anything but also the united states.. 
they should have paid something to the japanese as a token blood money for burning millions alive just to knwo if that damn bomb would work.. lol
This is must read book. Got this from Amazon.com before. For people caring about modern history and what evil things we all can do.
I wonder what content was left out in this "abridged" version?
